text:
FormAssembly.com | Full-time | REMOTE

We run FormAssembly.com, a leading form and data processing service designed for the Enterprise.

We're remote-first, lean, bootstrapped, profitable, and growing rapidly - thanks to our impressive roster of customers.

We are looking to fill a few key positions, including:

* Director IT Infrastructure and Operations

* Information Security Engineer

We offer a competitive salary with stock options in a growth stage company, health benefits, 401K, 4 weeks paid vacation time.

Position is full-time remote. To learn more about the position and apply, go to https://formassembly.workable.com/
